com.ikueb

Class TimeHashUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikueb.TimeHashUtils

  • public final class TimeHashUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utilities class for hashing to and unhashing from a short date-time representation, with up to nanosecond precision.
    See Also:
    TimeHashUtils.SubSecond

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  TimeHashUtils.SubSecond
      Handles sub-seconds hashing and unhashing.

                                    TimeHashUtils.SubSecond handler)
        Parameters:

        handler - the TimeHashUtils.SubSecond value to handle sub-seconds
        Returns:
        hashed value of the clock's current time with the desired precision
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if year is less than epoch year or larger than max year

      • hash

        public static java.lang.String hash(java.time.LocalDateTime value)
        Hashes the date-time with an appropriate precision given the following pseudo-code:
        1. If sub-seconds value = 0, Then use TRIM.
        2. If sub-seconds is multiple of 1,000,000, Then use MILLIS.
        3. Else use NANOS.
        Parameters:
        value - the date-time to hash
        Returns:
        hashed value of the date-time with an appropriate precision
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if year is less than epoch year or larger than max year

      • hash

        public static java.lang.String hash(java.time.LocalDateTime value,
                                    TimeHashUtils.SubSecond handler)
        Parameters:
        value - the date-time to hash
        handler - the TimeHashUtils.SubSecond value to handle sub-seconds
        Returns:
        hashed value of the date-time with the desired precision
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if year is less than epoch year or larger than max year

      • hash

        private static java.lang.String hash(int year,
                                     int month,
                                     int day,
                                     int secondOfDay,
                                     int subSecond,
                                     TimeHashUtils.SubSecond handler)
        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month of year
        day - the day of month
        secondOfDay - the second of day
        subSecond - the sub-seconds value

        Returns:
        the hashed value with the desired precision
